languages.text: "Какие-то проходимцы то и дело его малюют то на оборудовании, то на стенках. Найду негодяев — руки оторву и на сервиторизацию отправлю". {n}Начальник смены насупливается.{/n} "Это какое-то смутьянство? Я не знал. Увидите такой — сообщите мне, попробуем отыскать этих малевальщиков".

"Somebody keeps daubing it on the equipment and bulkheads. If I find the scoundrels, I'll tear their hands off and send them for servitorisation." {n}The shift foreman frowns.{/n} "Is it some kind of sedition? I didn't know. If you see one of these, let me know, we'll try to find these artists."
languages.original_text: "Какие-то проходимцы то и дело его малюют то на оборудовании, то на стенках. Найду негодяев — руки оторву и на сервиторизацию отправлю". {n}Начальник смены насупливается.{/n} "Это какое-то смутьянство? Я не знал. Увидите такой — сообщите мне, попробуем отыскать этих малевальщиков".

If you see one of these, let me know, we'll try to find these artists."

languages.text: «Alguien se dedica a pintarrajear esas marcas en la maquinaria y las mamparas. Como pille a los granujas, les corto las manos y los mando a que los conviertan en servidores». {n}El capataz frunce el ceño.{/n} «¿Será un símbolo de sedición? No lo sé. Avíseme si ve alguno de estos, a ver si logramos dar con los artistas».
languages.original_text: "Somebody keeps daubing it on the equipment and bulkheads. If I find the scoundrels, I'll tear their hands off and send them for servitorisation." {n}The shift foreman frowns.{/n} "Is it some kind of sedition? I didn't know. If you see one of these, let me know, we'll try to find these artists."

traits.locale_text: «Alguien se dedica a pintarrajear esas marcas en la maquinaria y las mamparas. Como pille a los granujas, les corto las manos y los mando a que los conviertan en servidores». {n}El capataz frunce el ceño.{/n} «¿Será un símbolo de sedición? No lo sé. Avíseme si ve alguno de estos, a ver si logramos dar con los artistas».

languages.text: 「誰かが機器や隔壁にそれを塗り続けています。もし悪党を見つけたら、両手を引きちぎってサーヴィターに送り込みます」{n}シフト主任が顔をしかめた。{/n}「ある種の反乱ですか？聞いたことないです。もしそのような者を見かけたら教えてください。そいつらを探してみます」
languages.original_text: "Somebody keeps daubing it on the equipment and bulkheads. If I find the scoundrels, I'll tear their hands off and send them for servitorisation." {n}The shift foreman frowns.{/n} "Is it some kind of sedition? I didn't know. If you see one of these, let me know, we'll try to find these artists."

traits.locale_text: 「誰かが機器や隔壁にそれを塗り続けています。もし悪党を見つけたら、両手を引きちぎってサーヴィターに送り込みます」{n}シフト主任が顔をしかめた。{/n}「ある種の反乱ですか？聞いたことないです。もしそのような者を見かけたら教えてください。そいつらを探してみます」

languages.text: “不知道是谁，一直在设备和船舱上画这些东西。要是让我找到这群王八蛋，我要把他们胳膊扯下来，亲自押送他们进行机仆改造。”{n}领班皱起了眉头。{/n}“这是煽动之类的吗，我说不好。如果您看到这样的符号，记得告诉我，我们会努力把那些大画家揪出来。”
languages.original_text: "Somebody keeps daubing it on the equipment and bulkheads. If I find the scoundrels, I'll tear their hands off and send them for servitorisation." {n}The shift foreman frowns.{/n} "Is it some kind of sedition? I didn't know. If you see one of these, let me know, we'll try to find these artists."

traits.locale_text: “不知道是谁，一直在设备和船舱上画这些东西。要是让我找到这群王八蛋，我要把他们胳膊扯下来，亲自押送他们进行机仆改造。”{n}领班皱起了眉头。{/n}“这是煽动之类的吗，我说不好。如果您看到这样的符号，记得告诉我，我们会努力把那些大画家揪出来。”

languages.text: "Jemand beschmiert damit das Equipment und die Schotten. Wenn ich diese Halunken finde, reiße ich ihnen die Hände ab und lasse sie servitorisieren." {n}Der Schichtleiter runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ist das eine Art Volksverhetzung? Das wusste ich nicht. Wenn Ihr einen dieser Gesellen seht, lasst es mich wissen, dann versuchen wir, diese Künstler zu finden."
languages.original_text: "Somebody keeps daubing it on the equipment and bulkheads. If I find the scoundrels, I'll tear their hands off and send them for servitorisation." {n}The shift foreman frowns.{/n} "Is it some kind of sedition? I didn't know. If you see one of these, let me know, we'll try to find these artists."

traits.locale_text: "Jemand beschmiert damit das Equipment und die Schotten. Wenn ich diese Halunken finde, reiße ich ihnen die Hände ab und lasse sie servitorisieren." {n}Der Schichtleiter runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ist das eine Art Volksverhetzung? Das wusste ich nicht. Wenn Ihr einen dieser Gesellen seht, lasst es mich wissen, dann versuchen wir, diese Künstler zu finden."

languages.text: « Quelqu'un s'amuse à en barbouiller sur les équipements et les cloisons. Si je trouve le responsable, je me ferai un plaisir de lui arracher les mains et de l'envoyer se faire servitoriser. » {n}Le contremaître fronce les sourcils.{/n} « C'est une forme de sédition ? Je savais pas. Si vous en voyez d'autres, faites-le-moi savoir, et on essaiera de mettre la main sur ces fameux artistes. »
languages.original_text: "Somebody keeps daubing it on the equipment and bulkheads. If I find the scoundrels, I'll tear their hands off and send them for servitorisation." {n}The shift foreman frowns.{/n} "Is it some kind of sedition? I didn't know. If you see one of these, let me know, we'll try to find these artists."

traits.locale_text: « Quelqu'un s'amuse à en barbouiller sur les équipements et les cloisons. Si je trouve le responsable, je me ferai un plaisir de lui arracher les mains et de l'envoyer se faire servitoriser. » {n}Le contremaître fronce les sourcils.{/n} « C'est une forme de sédition ? Je savais pas. Si vous en voyez d'autres, faites-le-moi savoir, et on essaiera de mettre la main sur ces fameux artistes. »

languages.text: "Birisi onu ekipmanlara ve bölme panellerine çizip duruyor. O alçağı bir bulayım, ellerini koparıp hizmetörleştirmeye göndereceğim." {n}Vardiya ustabaşı kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Bu bir tür ayaklanma filan mı? Haberim yoktu. Onlardan birini görürseniz bana haber verin de ressamlarını bulmaya çalışalım."
languages.original_text: "Somebody keeps daubing it on the equipment and bulkheads. If I find the scoundrels, I'll tear their hands off and send them for servitorisation." {n}The shift foreman frowns.{/n} "Is it some kind of sedition? I didn't know. If you see one of these, let me know, we'll try to find these artists."
